lines.text: Hey, hot shot. We're out of food.
Well, where's that food that's supposed to be around here?
You hear that, everyone? Hot shot says there's food up ahead. That is, if he's reading his map right. Well, what the hell, let's get going. I'm hungry.
Okay Mr. Jenson. Get your ass in gear and let's go!

If there's a God left up there to believe in. My father who art in heaven you've a made a jack ass out of me for years. Neville's God, that's the God I believe in! You see what you want you take. You take it! And I am going to do just that!
Tucker, I don't like going down without you!
God sent a plague down on us because we're just a bunch of no good fellers.
You know, when I was a boy, my father couldn't wait to get off the reservation. He even changed his name to Mr. White.
Look, it's like I just said, great, there's no food! And mighty animal spirits are stalking the land! Now what the hell are we going to do?
Mighty advertising executive speak with empty head!
The canteen's been evolved, Prof. In and out.
